name: tipsbot
description: a Slack bot that gives you useful tips

scripts.start: npm run build && BOT_CHANNEL='test' node bin/index.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.commit: npm run test && git-cz && npm run build && npm run git-build
scripts.build: npm run clean && node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir build
scripts.publish:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm test && npm run build && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
